trans-unit.source: Provides culture-specific information for formatting and parsing numeric values.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于对数字值进行格式设置和分析的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class contains culture-specific information that is used when you format and parse numeric values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>类包含格式化和分析数值时所使用的区域性特定信息。

trans-unit.source: This information includes the currency symbol, the decimal symbol, the group separator symbol, and the symbols for positive and negative signs.
trans-unit.target: 此信息包括货币符号、 小数符号、 组分隔符符号和正负符号的符号。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a NumberFormatInfo object
trans-unit.target: 实例化 NumberFormatInfo 对象

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of the current culture, the invariant culture, a specific culture, or a neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，表示当前区域性、 固定区域性，该特性区域性中或非特定区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a NumberFormatInfo object for the current culture
trans-unit.target: 实例化一个用于当前区域性的 NumberFormatInfo 对象

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the current thread culture in any of the following ways.
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>处于以下任一当前线程区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 每种情况下，返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: By retrieving a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current thread culture from the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, and retrieving the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object from its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，表示当前线程区域性从<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，并检索<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象从其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回对象`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.GetInstance%2A> method with a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.GetInstance%2A>方法替换<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses these three ways to create <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> objects that represent the formatting conventions of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用以下三种方式创建<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>表示当前区域性的格式设置约定的对象。

trans-unit.source: It also retrieves the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property to illustrate that each object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 它还将检索的值<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性来说明每个对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: You can create a writable <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the conventions of the current thread culture in any of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的可写<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>处于以下任一表示当前线程区域性的约定的对象：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object in any of the ways illustrated in the previous code example, and calling the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.Clone%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>中的方式在前面的代码示例所示，然后调用任一对象<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.Clone%2A>方法返回的<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: This creates a copy of the original <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, except that its <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建的原始副本<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，但其<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the current culture, and then using its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to retrieve the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来创建<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象表示的当前区域性，，然后使用其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，以检索<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates these two ways of instantiating a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, and displays the value of its <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A> property to illustrate that the object is not read-only.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了这两种方式的实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，并显示的值其<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.IsReadOnly%2A>属性来说明对象不是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Windows operating system allows the user to override some of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> property values used in numeric formatting and parsing operations through the **Region and Language** item in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，Windows 操作系统允许用户重写某些<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>属性值中数值的格式设置和分析操作中的通过使用**地区和语言**控制面板中的项。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user whose culture is English (United States) might choose to display currency values as 1.1 USD instead of the default of $1.1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，其区域性为英语 （美国） 的用户可以选择要作为价格 （美元） 1.1 显示货币值，而不是默认值为 $1.1。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> objects retrieved in the ways discussed previously all reflect these user overrides.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>中所述的方式检索对象之前都反映这些用户重写。

trans-unit.source: If this is undesirable, you can create a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that does not reflect user overrides (and that is also read/write rather than read-only) by calling the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor and supplying a value of `false` for the `useUserOverride` argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是不可取，则可以创建<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>不会反映用户替代的对象 (这也是读/写而不是只读的) 通过调用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数和提供的值`false`为`useUserOverride`自变量。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an illustration for a system whose current culture is English (United States) and whose currency symbol has been changed from the default of $ to USD.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供方面的演示系统的当前区域性为英语 （美国） 和其货币符号的安全提供程序已从 $ 默认值更改为价格 （美元）。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `true`, the properties <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.TextInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> are also retrieved from the user settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`true`，属性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.TextInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>也会检索从用户设置。

trans-unit.source: If the user settings are incompatible with the culture associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object (for example, if the selected calendar is not one of the calendars listed by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> property), the results of the methods and the values of the properties are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户设置均与关联的区域性不兼容<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象 (例如，如果所选的日历不是按列出的日历之一<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>属性)，则结果的方法和属性的值是未定义。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a NumberFormatInfo object for the invariant culture
trans-unit.target: 实例化用于固定区域性 NumberFormatInfo 对象

trans-unit.source: The invariant culture represents a culture that is culture-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 固定区域性表示区域性的不区分区域性的。

trans-unit.source: It is based on the English language but not on any specific English-speaking country/region.
trans-unit.target: 它基于英语语言，但不是能在任何特定英语国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: Although the data of specific cultures can be dynamic and can change to reflect new cultural conventions or user preferences, the data of the invariant culture does not change.
trans-unit.target: 虽然特定区域性的数据可以是动态的并且可以更改以反映新区域性约定或用户首选项，则不会更改的固定区域性的数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of the invariant culture can be used for formatting operations in which result strings should not vary by culture.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>表示固定区域性的格式设置约定的对象可以用于格式设置的操作中的结果字符串应不变的区域性。

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of the invariant culture in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>通过以下方式表示固定区域性的格式设置约定的对象：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property from the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性从<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>返回的对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: By calling the parameterless <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A> class constructor.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用的无参数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.%23ctor%2A>类构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read/write.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象为读/写。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses each of these methods to instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用上述每种方法来实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>表示固定区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: It then indicates whether the object is read-only,
trans-unit.target: 它然后指示对象是只读的

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a NumberFormatInfo object for a specific culture
trans-unit.target: 实例化特定区域性 NumberFormatInfo 对象

trans-unit.source: A specific culture represents a language that is spoken in a particular country/region.
trans-unit.target: 特定区域性表示特定的国家/地区中所说的语言。

trans-unit.source: For example, en-US is a specific culture that represents the English language spoken in the United States, and en-CA is a specific culture that represents the English language spoken in Canada.
trans-unit.target: 例如，EN-US 代表美国英语语言的特定区域性，并且 en CA 表示说在加拿大的英语语言的特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of a specific culture in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>通过以下方式表示特定区域性的格式设置约定的对象：

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and retrieving the value of the returned <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object's <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和检索的值的返回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: By passing a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object you want to retrieve to the static <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.GetInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过将传递<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示的区域性的对象其<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象你想要检索为对静态<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.GetInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read/write.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象为读/写。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method and retrieving the value of the returned <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object's <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法和检索的值的返回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read/write.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象为读/写。

trans-unit.source: By calling one of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> class constructors and retrieving the value of the returned <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object's <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用之一<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>类构造函数和检索的值的返回<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象的<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read/write.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象为读/写。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses these four ways to create a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects the formatting conventions of the Indonesian (Indonesia) culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用以下四种方式创建<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>反映印度尼西亚语 （印度尼西亚） 区域性的格式设置约定的对象。

trans-unit.source: It also indicates whether each object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 它还指示每个对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating a NumberFormatInfo object for a neutral culture
trans-unit.target: 实例化非特定区域性 NumberFormatInfo 对象

trans-unit.source: A neutral culture represents a culture or language that is independent of a country/region.
trans-unit.target: 表示非特定区域性的区域性或语言无关的国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: It is typically the parent of one or more specific cultures.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是父任务的一个或多个特定区域性。

trans-unit.source: For example, fr is a neutral culture for the French language and the parent of the fr-FR culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，fr 是非特定区域性的法语语言和 FR-FR 区域性的父级。

trans-unit.source: You create a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of a neutral culture in the same way that you create a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the formatting conventions of a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: 你创建<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，在你创建的相同方式表示非特定区域性的格式设置约定<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，表示特定区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, trying to retrieve a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects the formatting conventions of a neutral culture throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和早期版本中，尝试检索<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>反映的非特定区域性的格式设置约定的对象引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: However, because it is independent of a specific country/region, a neutral culture lacks culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 但是，因为它是独立于特定的国家/地区，非特定区域性缺少区域性特定格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: Rather than populating the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object with generic values, the .NET Framework returns a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects the formatting conventions of a specific culture that is a child of the neutral culture.
trans-unit.target: 而不是填充<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象泛型值，.NET Framework 返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>反映特定的格式设置约定区域性的对象是非特定区域性的子级。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the neutral en culture reflects the formatting conventions of the en-US culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the fr culture reflects the formatting conventions of the fr-FR culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象的非特定 en 区域性反映 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象 fr 区域性反映 FR-FR 区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: You can use code like the following to determine which specific culture's formatting conventions each neutral culture represents.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用类似如下的代码以确定每个非特定区域性表示的哪些特定区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: NumberFormatInfo and dynamic data
trans-unit.target: NumberFormatInfo 和动态数据

trans-unit.source: The culture-specific data for formatting numeric values provided by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class is dynamic, just like the cultural data provided by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 用于格式化数值的值由提供的区域性特定数据<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>类是动态的就像提供的区域性数据一样<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类。

trans-unit.source: You should not make any assumptions about the stability of values for <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> objects that are associated with particular <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects.
trans-unit.target: 不应作出有关稳定性的值的任何假设<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>关联的对象与特定<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: Only the data provided by the invariant culture and its associated <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is stable.
trans-unit.target: 仅提供固定区域性和其关联的数据<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Other data can change between application sessions, or even within a single session, for the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 其他数据，可以更改应用程序会话之间或甚至单个会话中，原因如下：

trans-unit.source: **System updates.**
trans-unit.target: **系统更新。**

trans-unit.source: Cultural preferences such as the currency symbol or currency formats change over time.
trans-unit.target: 随着时间的推移更改如货币符号或货币格式的区域性首选项。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, Windows Update includes changes to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> property value for a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，Windows 更新包括对更改<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>针对特定区域性的属性值。

trans-unit.source: **Replacement cultures.**
trans-unit.target: **替换的区域性。**

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class can be used to replace the data of an existing culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>类可以用于替换现有的区域性的数据。

trans-unit.source: **Cascading changes to property values.**
trans-unit.target: **级联更改属性值。**

trans-unit.source: A number of culture-related properties can change at run time, which, in turn, causes <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> data to change.
trans-unit.target: 多个区域性相关属性可以更改在运行时，这反过来会导致<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>数据更改。

trans-unit.source: For example, the current culture can be changed either programmatically or through user action.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以编程方式或通过用户执行任何操作，则可以更改当前区域性。

trans-unit.source: When this happens, the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A> property changes to an object associated with the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A>属性更改为与当前区域性关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: **User preferences.**
trans-unit.target: **用户首选项。**

trans-unit.source: Users of your application might override some of the values associated with the current system culture through the region and language options in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的用户可能会替代一些与通过控制面板中的区域和语言选项的当前系统区域性关联的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, users might choose a different currency symbol or a different decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: 例如，用户可能选择不同的货币符号或不同的小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to `true` (its default value), the properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object are also retrieved from the user settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.UseUserOverride%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性设置为`true`（其默认值） 的属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>从用户设置还检索对象。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, all user-overridable properties of a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object are initialized when the object is created.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 2.0 的所有用户可重写属性开始<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象时创建该对象进行初始化。

trans-unit.source: There is still a possibility of inconsistency, because neither object creation nor the user override process is atomic, and the relevant values may change during object creation.
trans-unit.target: 则仍可能的不一致，因为既不对象创建也不用户重写过程是原子操作，而且相关的值可能在对象创建期间发生更改。

trans-unit.source: However, these inconsistencies should be extremely rare.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这些不一致问题应该极少。

trans-unit.source: You can control whether user overrides are reflected in <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> objects that represent the same culture as the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 你可以控制是否将用户重写反映在<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>表示与当前线程区域性相同的区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ways in which a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object can be retrieved and indicates whether the resulting object reflects user overrides.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了在哪些方面<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象可以检索和指示生成的对象是否反映用户重写。

trans-unit.source: Source of CultureInfo and NumberFormatInfo object
trans-unit.target: CultureInfo 和 NumberFormatInfo 对象数据源

trans-unit.source: Reflects user overrides
trans-unit.target: 反映用户重写

trans-unit.source: `CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.NumberFormat` property
trans-unit.target: `CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.NumberFormat` 属性

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CreateSpecificCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%29> 构造函数

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> 构造函数

trans-unit.source: Depends on value of `useUserOverride` parameter
trans-unit.target: 取决于值`useUserOverride`参数

trans-unit.source: Unless there is a compelling reason to do otherwise, you should respect user overrides when you use the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object in client applications to format and parse user input or to display numeric data.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有人信服的理由，否则，在使用时，请参阅用户替代<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>进行格式化和分析用户输入或显示数值数据的客户端应用程序中的对象。

trans-unit.source: For server applications or unattended applications, you should not respect user overrides.
trans-unit.target: 对于服务器应用程序或无人参与的应用程序，不应遵守用户重写。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are using the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object either explicitly or implicitly to persist numeric data in string form, you should either use a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects the formatting conventions of the invariant culture, or you should specify a custom numeric format string that you use regardless of culture.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象显式或隐式若要保存以字符串形式的数值数据，你应使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>反映固定区域性，或你的格式设置约定的对象应指定无论区域性使用的自定义数字格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: IFormatProvider, NumberFormatInfo, and numeric formatting
trans-unit.target: IFormatProvider、 NumberFormatInfo，和数字格式设置

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is used implicitly or explicitly in all numeric formatting operations.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象将用于隐式或显式格式设置操作的所有数字。

trans-unit.source: These include calls to the following methods:
trans-unit.target: 这些方法包括对以下方法的调用：

trans-unit.source: All numeric formatting methods, such as <xref:System.Int32.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 所有数字格式设置方法，如<xref:System.Int32.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Double.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Convert.ToString%28System.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The major composite formatting method, <xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 主要的复合格式设置方法， <xref:System.String.Format%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Other composite formatting methods, such as <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder.AppendFormat%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 其他复合格式设置方法，如<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Text.StringBuilder.AppendFormat%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: All numeric formatting operations make use of an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 所有数值的格式设置操作使使用<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface includes a single method, <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%28System.Type%29>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口包含单个方法<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%28System.Type%29>。

trans-unit.source: This is a callback method that is passed a <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type needed to provide formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 这是传递一个回调方法<xref:System.Type>表示提供的格式设置信息所需的类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: The method is responsible for returning either an instance of that type or `null`, if it cannot provide an instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 方法负责返回该类型的实例或`null`，如果它不能提供类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementations for formatting numbers:
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供了两个<xref:System.IFormatProvider>格式化数字的实现：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class, which represents a specific culture (or a specific language in a specific country/region).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>类，该类表示特定区域性 （或特定国家/地区中的特定语言）。

trans-unit.source: In a numeric formatting operation, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object associated with its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 在数字格式设置操作，<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>与关联的对象及其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.NumberFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class, which provides information about the formatting conventions of its associated culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>类，该类提供的及其关联的区域性信息的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns an instance of itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.GetFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回其自身的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation is not provided to a formatting method explicitly, a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property that represents the current thread culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现不提供给格式设置方法显式<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用表示当前线程区域性的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the relationship between the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface and the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class in formatting operations by defining a custom <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了之间的关系<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>在通过定义一个自定义格式设置操作的类<xref:System.IFormatProvider>实现。

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A> method displays the type name of the object requested by the formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.IFormatProvider.GetFormat%2A>方法显示的格式设置操作请求的对象的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: If the interface is requesting a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, this method provides the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求接口<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，此方法提供<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>当前线程区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: As the output from the example shows, the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method requests a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object to provide formatting information, whereas the <xref:System.String.Format%28System.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method requests <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> objects as well as an <xref:System.ICustomFormatter> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如示例所示，输出<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法请求<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象以提供格式设置信息，而<xref:System.String.Format%28System.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法请求<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象以及<xref:System.ICustomFormatter>实现。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.IFormatProvider> implementation is not explicitly provided in a numeric formatting method call, the method calls the `CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.GetFormat` method, which returns the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that corresponds to the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IFormatProvider>数字格式设置方法调用，方法调用中未显式提供实现`CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.GetFormat`方法，它返回<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对应于当前线程区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: Format strings and NumberFormatInfo properties
trans-unit.target: 格式字符串和 NumberFormatInfo 属性

trans-unit.source: Every formatting operation uses either a standard or a custom numeric format string to produce a result string from a number.
trans-unit.target: 每个格式设置操作使用一种标准或自定义数字格式字符串来生成大量的结果字符串。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the use of a format string to produce a result string is explicit, as in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，生成的结果字符串的格式字符串的使用是显式的如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: This code calls the <xref:System.Decimal.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to convert a <xref:System.Decimal> value to a number of different string representations by using the formatting conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 此代码调用<xref:System.Decimal.ToString%28System.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将转换<xref:System.Decimal>为通过使用 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定的不同字符串表示形式的数字的值。

trans-unit.source: In other cases, the use of a format string is implicit.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情况下，格式字符串的使用是隐式的。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the following method calls to the default or parameterless <xref:System.Decimal.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the value of the <xref:System.Decimal> instance is formatted by using the general ("G") format specifier and the conventions of the current culture, which in this case is the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在为默认值或无参数的以下方法调用<xref:System.Decimal.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法、 的值<xref:System.Decimal>使用常规 ("G") 格式说明符和当前区域性，在这种情况下的约定格式化实例EN-US 区域性。

trans-unit.source: Each standard numeric format string uses one or more <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> properties to determine the pattern or the symbols used in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 每个标准数字格式字符串使用一个或多个<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>属性以确定模式或结果字符串中使用的符号。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, each custom numeric format specifier except "0" and "#" insert symbols in the result string that are defined by <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> properties.
trans-unit.target: 同样，每个自定义数字格式说明符"0"和"#"定义的结果字符串中插入符号但<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the standard and custom numeric format specifiers and their associated <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了标准和自定义数字格式说明符和其关联<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>属性。

trans-unit.source: To change the appearance of the result string for a particular culture, see the [Modifying NumberFormatInfo properties](#modifying) section.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改的特定区域性的结果字符串的外观，请参阅[修改 NumberFormatInfo 属性](#modifying)部分。

trans-unit.source: For details about the use of these format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，有关使用这些格式说明符，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)和[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: Format specifier
trans-unit.target: 格式说明符

trans-unit.source: Associated properties
trans-unit.target: 关联的属性

trans-unit.source: "C" or "c" (currency format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "C"或者"c"（货币格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A>, to define the default number of fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A>用于定义默认的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>, to define the group or thousands separator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>定义组或千位分隔符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSizes%2A>, to define the sizes of integral groups.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSizes%2A>定义整数组的大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A>, to define the pattern of negative currency values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A>定义负货币值的模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A>, to define the pattern of positive currency values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyPositivePattern%2A>来定义正货币值的模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A>, to define the currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A>若要定义货币符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: "D" or "d" (decimal format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "D"或者"d"（十进制格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: "E" or "e" (exponential or scientific format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "E"或者"e"（指数或科学记数格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol in the mantissa and exponent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>定义中的尾数和指数的负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>, to define the positive sign symbol in the exponent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>定义在指数中的正号符号。

trans-unit.source: "F" or "f" (fixed-point format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "F"或者"f"（定点格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalDigits%2A>, to define the default number of fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalDigits%2A>用于定义默认的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: "G" or "g" (general format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "G"或者"g"（常规格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>, to define the positive sign symbol for result strings in exponential format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>定义结果字符串的正号符号指数格式。

trans-unit.source: "N" or "n" (number format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "N"或者"n"（数字格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalDigits%2A>, to define the default number of fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalDigits%2A>用于定义默认的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>, to define the group separator (thousands) symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>定义组分隔符 （千为单位）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSizes%2A>, to define the number of integral digits in a group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSizes%2A>用于定义组中的整数位数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberNegativePattern%2A>, to define the format of negative values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberNegativePattern%2A>定义负值的格式。

trans-unit.source: "P" or "p" (percent format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "P"或者"p"（百分比格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentDecimalDigits%2A>, to define the default number of fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentDecimalDigits%2A>用于定义默认的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentGroupSeparator%2A>, to define the group separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentGroupSeparator%2A>若要定义组分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentGroupSizes%2A>, to define the number of integral digits in a group.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentGroupSizes%2A>用于定义组中的整数位数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentNegativePattern%2A>, to define the placement of the percent symbol and the negative symbol for negative values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentNegativePattern%2A>定义百分比符号和负号负值的放置位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentPositivePattern%2A>, to define the placement of the percent symbol for positive values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentPositivePattern%2A>定义正值的百分比符号的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentSymbol%2A>, to define the percent symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentSymbol%2A>若要定义百分比符号。

trans-unit.source: "R" or "r" (round-trip format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "R"或者"r"（往返过程格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>若要定义负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>, to define the positive sign symbol in an exponent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>若要在指数中定义的正号符号。

trans-unit.source: "X" or "x" (hexadecimal format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "X"或"x"（十六进制格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: 无。

trans-unit.source: "." (decimal point custom format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "."（小数点自定义格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>, to define the decimal separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberDecimalSeparator%2A>若要定义小数分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: "," (group separator custom format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "，"（组分隔符自定义格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>, to define the group (thousands) separator symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NumberGroupSeparator%2A>若要定义组 （千位） 分隔符符号。

trans-unit.source: "%" (percentage placeholder custom format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "%"（百分比占位符自定义格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentSymbol%2A>, to define the percent symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PercentSymbol%2A>若要定义百分比符号。

trans-unit.source: "‰" (per mille placeholder custom format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "‰"（每个千分比占位符自定义格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PerMilleSymbol%2A>, to define the per mille symbol.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PerMilleSymbol%2A>定义千分比符号。

trans-unit.source: "E" (exponential notation custom format specifier)
trans-unit.target: "E"（指数记数法自定义格式说明符）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, to define the negative sign symbol in the mantissa and exponent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>定义中的尾数和指数的负号符号。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>, to define the positive sign symbol in the exponent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>定义在指数中的正号符号。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> class includes a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NativeDigits%2A> property that specifies the base 10 digits used by a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>类包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NativeDigits%2A>指定十进制数字特定区域性使用的属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the property is not used in formatting operations; only the Basic Latin digits 0 (U+0030) through 9 (U+0039) are used in the result string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式设置操作; 但是，不使用属性基本拉丁文数字 0 (U + 0030) 到 9 (U + 0039) 结果字符串中使用。

trans-unit.source: In addition, for <xref:System.Single> and <xref:System.Double> values of `NaN`, `PositiveInfinity`, and `NegativeInfinity`, the result string consists exclusively of the symbols defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A>, <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>, and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此外，对于<xref:System.Single>和<xref:System.Double>值`NaN`， `PositiveInfinity`，和`NegativeInfinity`，结果字符串由独立于所定义的符号<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NaNSymbol%2A>， <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveInfinitySymbol%2A>，和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeInfinitySymbol%2A>属性分别。

trans-unit.source: Modifying NumberFormatInfo properties
trans-unit.target: 修改 NumberFormatInfo 属性

trans-unit.source: You can modify the properties of a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object to customize the result string produced in a numeric formatting operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改的属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象自定义结果字符串生成数字格式设置操作。

trans-unit.source: To do this:
trans-unit.target: 具体方法为：

trans-unit.source: Create a read/write copy of a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object whose formatting conventions you want to modify.
trans-unit.target: 创建的读/写副本<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象你想要修改其格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Instantiating a NumberFormatInfo object](#Instantiating) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NumberFormatInfo 对象进行实例化](#Instantiating)部分。

trans-unit.source: Modify the property or properties that are used to produce the desired result string.
trans-unit.target: 修改或多个用于生成所需的结果字符串的属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about how formatting methods use <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> properties to define result strings, see the [Format strings and NumberFormatInfo properties](#properties) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何格式设置方法使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>属性以定义结果字符串，请参阅[格式化字符串和 NumberFormatInfo 属性](#properties)部分。

trans-unit.source: Use the custom <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object as the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> argument in calls to formatting methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象作为<xref:System.IFormatProvider>为格式化方法的调用中的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Instead of dynamically modifying a culture's property values each time an application is started, you can use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder> class to define either a custom culture (a culture that has a unique name and that supplements existing cultures) or a replacement culture (one that is used instead of a specific culture).
trans-unit.target: 而不是每次启动应用程序时动态修改区域性的属性值，你可以使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureAndRegionInfoBuilder>类来定义自定义区域性 （具有一个唯一名称和补充现有区域性的区域性） 或替换（一个使用而不是特定区域性） 的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The following sections provide some examples.
trans-unit.target: 下列各节提供一些示例。

trans-unit.source: Modifying the currency symbol and pattern
trans-unit.target: 修改的货币符号和模式

trans-unit.source: The following example modifies a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that that represents the formatting conventions of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例修改<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象，它表示 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定。

trans-unit.source: It assigns the ISO-4217 currency symbol to the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A> property and defines a pattern for currency values that consists of the currency symbol followed by a space and a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 它将分配到的 ISO 4217 货币符号<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A>属性并定义货币值组成后, 跟一个空格和一个数字值的货币符号的模式。

trans-unit.source: Formatting a national identification number
trans-unit.target: 格式设置的国家/地区的标识号

trans-unit.source: Many national identification numbers consist exclusively of digits and so can easily be formatted by modifying the properties of a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 许多身份证号全部由数字组成，并因此可轻松地进行格式设置通过修改的属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, a social security number in the United States consists of 9 digits arranged as follows: `XXX-XX-XXXX`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在美国社会安全号码包含，如下所示排列的 9 位数： `XXX-XX-XXXX`。

trans-unit.source: The following example assumes that social security numbers are stored as integer values and formats them appropriately.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例假定身份证号将存储为整数值，并将其设置适当的格式。

trans-unit.source: Parsing numeric strings
trans-unit.target: 分析数值字符串

trans-unit.source: Parsing involves converting the string representation of a number to a number.
trans-unit.target: 分析涉及将数字的字符串表示转换为数字。

trans-unit.source: Each numeric type in the .NET Framework includes two overloaded parsing methods: `Parse` and `TryParse`.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 中的每个数值类型包括两个重载的分析方法：`Parse`和`TryParse`。

trans-unit.source: The `Parse` method converts a string to a number and throws an exception if the conversion fails.
trans-unit.target: `Parse`方法将字符串转换为数字，并引发异常，如果转换失败。

trans-unit.source: The `TryParse` method converts a string to a number, assigns the number to an `out` argument, and returns a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
trans-unit.target: `TryParse`方法将字符串转换为数字，将分配到数值`out`自变量，并返回<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示转换是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The parsing methods implicitly or explicitly use a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> enumeration value to determine what style elements (such as group separators, a decimal separator, or a currency symbol) can be present in a string if the parsing operation is to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 分析方法隐式或显式使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>枚举值来确定哪些样式元素 （例如组分隔符、 小数分隔符或货币符号） 可出现在一个字符串，在分析操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> value is not provided in the method call, the default is a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles> value that includes the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float> and <xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands> flags, which specifies that the parsed string can include group symbols, a decimal separator, a negative sign, and white-space characters, or it can be the string representation of a number in exponential notation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>值是未提供在方法调用中，默认值是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles>值，包括<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.Float>和<xref:System.Globalization.NumberStyles.AllowThousands>标志，它指定所分析的字符串可以包括组符号、 小数分隔符，负号，和空白字符，也可以是指数记数法的数字的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: The parsing methods also implicitly or explicitly use a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that defines the specific symbols and patterns that can occur in the string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 分析方法，还将隐式或显式使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>定义特定的符号和模式的对象会导致要分析的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is not provided, the default is the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> for the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象未提供，则默认为<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>当前线程区域性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parsing, see the individual parsing methods, such as <xref:System.Int16.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Int32.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Int64.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Double.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Double%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Numerics.BigInteger%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关分析的详细信息，请参阅各个的分析方法，如<xref:System.Int16.Parse%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Int32.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Int64.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Decimal.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Double.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Double%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Numerics.BigInteger.TryParse%28System.String%2CSystem.Globalization.NumberStyles%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Numerics.BigInteger%40%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the culture-sensitive nature of parsing strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示分析字符串的区分区域性的性质。

trans-unit.source: It tries to parse a string that include thousands separators by using the conventions of the en-US, fr-FR, and invariant cultures.
trans-unit.target: 它将尝试为分析字符串包括千位分隔符通过使用 EN-US、 FR-FR，和固定区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: A string that includes the comma as a group separator and the period as a decimal separator fails to parse in the fr-FR culture, and a string with white space as a group separator and a comma as a decimal separator fails to parse in the en-US and invariant cultures.
trans-unit.target: 包括逗号作为组分隔符和句点无法分析 FR-FR 区域性中的小数分隔符的字符串和 white space 作为组分隔符与将逗号用作小数分隔符的字符串分析的 EN-US 和固定区域性中失败。

trans-unit.source: Parsing generally occurs in two contexts:
trans-unit.target: 分析通常发生在两个上下文：

trans-unit.source: As an operation that is designed to convert user input into a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 作为旨在将用户输入转换为数字值的操作。

trans-unit.source: As an operation that is designed to round-trip a numeric value; that is, to deserialize a numeric value that was previously serialized as a string.
trans-unit.target: 操作而设计的形式保存/还原数值;也就是说，若要反序列化以前序列化为字符串的数值。

trans-unit.source: The following sections discuss these two operations in greater detail.
trans-unit.target: 以下各节讨论更详细介绍这两个操作。

trans-unit.source: Parsing user strings
trans-unit.target: 分析用户字符串

trans-unit.source: When you are parsing numeric strings input by the user, you should always instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects the user's cultural settings.
trans-unit.target: 在分析数值字符串输入用户时，始终应实例化<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>反映用户的区域性设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to instantiate a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects user customizations, see the [NumberFormatInfo and dynamic data](#dynamic) section.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实例化信息<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象以反映用户自定义项，请参阅[NumberFormatInfo 和动态数据](#dynamic)部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the difference between a parsing operation that reflects user cultural settings and one that does not.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的分析操作中反映用户区域性设置和不之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the default system culture is en-US, but the user has defined "," as the decimal symbol and "." as the group separator in Control Panel, **Region and Language**.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，默认系统区域性为 EN-US，但用户定义"，"作为小数符号和"。"Control Panel 中中的组分隔符为**地区和语言**。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, these symbols are reversed in the default en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这些符号将反转中默认 EN-US 区域性。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters a string that reflects user settings, and the string is parsed by a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that also reflects user settings (overrides), the parsing operation returns a correct result.
trans-unit.target: 当用户输入一个字符串，反映用户设置，并对字符串进行分析通过<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>还反映用户设置 （重写） 的对象在分析操作返回正确的结果。

trans-unit.source: However, when the string is parsed by a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that reflects standard en-US cultural settings, it mistakes the comma symbol for a group separator and returns an incorrect result.
trans-unit.target: 但是，对字符串分析通过<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象以反映标准的 EN-US 区域性设置，它错误组分隔符的逗号符号，并返回错误的结果。

trans-unit.source: Serializing and deserializing numeric data
trans-unit.target: 序列化和反序列化数值数据

trans-unit.source: When numeric data is serialized in string format and later deserialized and parsed, the strings should be generated and parsed by using the conventions of the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: 当数字数据是以字符串格式序列化和更高版本反序列化和分析时，则应生成字符串，并将其分析通过使用固定区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: The formatting and parsing operations should never reflect the conventions of a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: 在格式设置和分析操作应永远不会反映特定区域性的约定。

trans-unit.source: If culture-specific settings are used, the portability of the data is strictly limited; it can be successfully deserialized only on a thread whose culture-specific settings are identical to those of the thread on which it was serialized.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用特定于区域性的设置，数据的可移植性是严格限制;它可以是线程的仅在线程的区域性特定设置是线程的相同的依据其进行序列化上成功反序列化。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, this means that the data cannot even be successfully deserialized on the same system on which it was serialized.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，这意味着，即使数据不能是依据其进行序列化在相同系统上成功反序列化。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates what can happen when this principle is violated.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例阐释了违反这一原则时可能发生。

trans-unit.source: Floating-point values in an array are converted to strings when the current thread uses the culture-specific settings of the en-US culture.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的浮点值转换为字符串时的当前线程使用 EN-US 区域性的区域性特定设置。

trans-unit.source: The data is then parsed by a thread that uses the culture-specific settings of the en-GB culture.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 EN-GB 区域性的区域性特定设置的线程，然后分析数据。

trans-unit.source: In this case, although each parsing operation succeeds, the data does not round-trip successfully and data corruption occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，虽然每个分析操作成功，数据不支持往返成功和发生数据损坏。

trans-unit.source: In other cases, a parsing operation could fail and a <xref:System.FormatException> exception could be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情况下，分析操作可能失败和<xref:System.FormatException>无法引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object for a corresponding <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object, and use the retrieved object to query number formatting information for the particular culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检索<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>相应的对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>对象，并使用检索到的对象查询数字格式设置特定区域性的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new writable instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> class that is culture-independent (invariant).
trans-unit.target: 初始化不依赖于区域性的（固定的）<see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> 类的新可写实例。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the new instance can be modified if your application needs user-defined formatting.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序需要用户定义的格式设置，则可以修改的新实例的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a shallow copy of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> 对象的浅表副本。

trans-unit.source: A new object copied from the original <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 从原始 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> 对象复制的新对象。

trans-unit.source: The clone is writable even if the original <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 克隆可写即使原始<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the properties of the clone can be modified with user-defined patterns.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以使用用户定义的模式修改克隆的属性。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of an object is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象的浅表副本是只是对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy will not create copies of the referred objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表副本将不创建所引用对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: It will refer to the original objects instead.
trans-unit.target: 它将改为引用对原始对象。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, a deep copy of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，对象的深层副本创建的对象的副本以及直接或间接引用该对象的所有内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object, a shallow copy is sufficient for copying all instance properties, because all properties that return object references are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 情况下<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象的浅表副本足以满足复制所有实例属性时，返回对象的引用的所有属性都是因为`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.Clone%2A> method to create a read/write copy of a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object that represents the numeric formatting conventions of the current thread culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.Clone%2A>方法创建的读/写副本<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>表示数字格式的当前线程区域性的约定的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of decimal places to use in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在货币值中使用的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: The number of decimal places to use in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 要在货币值中使用的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is 2.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值为 2。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A> property is used with the "C" standard format string without a precision specifier in numeric formatting operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalDigits%2A>属性用于不带精度说明符数字格式设置操作中的"C"标准格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: It defines the default number of fractional digits that appear after the decimal separator.
trans-unit.target: 它定义默认的小数分隔符后显示的小数位数。

trans-unit.source: This value is overridden if a precision specifier is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果精度说明符，则被重写此值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string to use as the decimal separator in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在货币值中用作小数分隔符的字符串。

trans-unit.target: 要在货币值中用作小数分隔符的字符串。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 默认为“.”。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the **Region and Language** item in Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A> property is used with the "C" standard format string to define the symbol that separates integral from fractional digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>属性用于与"C"标准格式字符串定义符号将与小数位分隔整型。

trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that separates groups of digits to the left of the decimal in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在货币值中隔开小数点左边的位数组的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string that separates groups of digits to the left of the decimal in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 在货币值中隔开小数点左边的位数组的字符串。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 默认为“,”。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the **Regional and Language** item in Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的初始值派生自中的设置**区域和语言**控制面板中的项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A> property is used with the "C" standard format string to define the symbol that separates groups of integral digits.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>属性用于与"C"标准格式字符串定义符号的整数位数进行分组。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md).

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何更改的效果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSeparator%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The property is being set and the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> object is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 设置了该属性，但 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" /> 对象为只读。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of digits in each group to the left of the decimal in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置货币值中小数点左边每一组的位数。

trans-unit.source: The number of digits in each group to the left of the decimal in currency values.
trans-unit.target: 货币值中小数点左边每一组的位数。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is a one-dimensional array with only one element, which is set to 3.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值是一个一维数组，该数组只包含一个设置为 3 的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSizes%2A> property is used with the "C" standard format string to define the number of digits that appear in integral groups.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSizes%2A>属性用于"C"标准格式字符串与整数的组中定义的显示的小数位数的数量。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: Every element in the one-dimensional array must be an integer from 1 through 9.
trans-unit.target: 一维数组中的每个元素必须是 1 到 9 的整数。

trans-unit.source: The last element can be 0.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个元素可为 0。

trans-unit.source: The first element of the array defines the number of elements in the least significant group of digits immediately to the left of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 数组的第一个元素紧邻的左侧的数字的最低有效组中定义的元素数<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyDecimalSeparator%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Each subsequent element refers to the next significant group of digits to the left of the previous group.
trans-unit.target: 每个后续元素是指上一组左侧的数字的下一步重要组。

trans-unit.source: If the last element of the array is not 0, the remaining digits are grouped based on the last element of the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组的最后一个元素是不为 0，则剩余数字进行分组基于数组的最后一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If the last element is 0, the remaining digits are not grouped.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个元素为 0，其余的数字进行分组。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the array contains { 3, 4, 5 }, the digits are grouped similar to "$55,55555,55555,55555,4444,333.00".
If the array contains { 3, 4, 0 }, the digits are grouped similar to "$55555555555555555,4444,333.00".
The following example demonstrates the effect of changing the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSizes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何更改的效果<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyGroupSizes%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format pattern for negative currency values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置负货币值的格式模式。

trans-unit.target: 负货币值的格式模式。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is 0, which represents "($n)", where "$" is the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol" /> and <paramref name="n" /> is a number.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值是 0，它表示“($n)”，其中“$”是 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol" />，<paramref name="n" /> 是一个数字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A> property is used with the "C" standard format string to define the pattern of negative currency values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A>属性用于"C"标准格式字符串来定义负货币值的模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property has one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此属性具有的值之一下表中。

trans-unit.source: The symbol "$" is the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A>, the symbol "-" is the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>, and `n` is a number.
trans-unit.target: "$"符号是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A>，符号"-"是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>，和`n`是一个数字。

trans-unit.source: Value
Associated pattern
trans-unit.target: 关联的模式
$ n
n $
$ n

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A> property defines the format of negative currency values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A>属性定义负货币值的格式。

trans-unit.source: It retrieves all the specific cultures that are defined on the host computer and displays each culture's <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A> property value, its associated pattern, and a number formatted as a currency value.
trans-unit.target: 它将检索所有特定区域性定义主计算机上并显示每个区域性的<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencyNegativePattern%2A>属性值、 其关联的模式和一个数字格式化为货币值。

trans-unit.target: 该属性设置为一个小于 0 或大于 15 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default for <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> is 0, which represents "$n", where "$" is the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol" /> and <paramref name="n" /> is a number.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.InvariantInfo" /> 的默认值是 0，它表示“$n”，其中“$”是 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol" />，<paramref name="n" /> 是一个数字。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property has one of the values in the following table.

trans-unit.target: "$"符号是<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrencySymbol%2A>和`n`是一个数字。

Associated pattern

trans-unit.source: Retrieving a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object from the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A> property is equivalent to retrieving a <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object from the `CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.NumberFormat` property.

trans-unit.source: It then uses reflection to display the property values of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.CurrentInfo%2A> property on a system whose current culture is en-US.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" />, if <paramref name="formatType" /> is the same as the type of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo" />; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
